page.title: 16RECREATION IN BEDWORTH
page.content: {B.M.X.}means Bicycle Moto-Cross.It is an American name & idea.A B.M.X.is a very light bicycle with special wheels called Mags or Skyways.You either race on mud tracks with hills & humps or do free-style where you do stunts.One of the stunts is called a Table-Top where you go up a"Quarter Pipe"(A ramp that curves up),come off the top & turn in mid-air & come back down the other way. {BREAK DANCING}is another American craze that has become very popular.It has stopped a lot of vandalism.It consists of spinning on different parts of your body.One of the simplest moves is "Crazy-Legs" where you lean on your arms & legs & kick,then move round in circles on 1 arm & spin on your back.The hardest move is the "Halo" where you spin on your head with your arms out,but off the ground.
